content.raw:
I've tested this with the `ign-cmake` branch of `ign-transport` and everything seems to be working smoothly. All the changes I've recommended are finished.

I'm still a bit concerned about [this `-mt-` matter](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-cmake/pull-requests/17/find-modules-needed-for-ignition-transport/activity#comment-50968513), but there's no reason to block this PR for that.
content.html:
I've tested this with the ign-cmake branch of ign-transport and everything seems to be working smoothly. All the changes I've recommended are finished.

I'm still a bit concerned about this -mt- matter, but there's no reason to block this PR for that.
